item.description:
I'm really looking forward to Brunch at Blue Grotto on Federal Hill for September.

They've been advertising "Brunch is coming!  Brunch is coming!" for several months.  Well, brunch is here now....and it looks great!

Check out their website:

http://www.bluegrottorestaurant.com/

and their Brunch Menu:

http://www.bluegrottorestaurant.com/menu_pages/pdfs/BlueGrotto_Brunch_Menu.pdf

When you look at the menu, you'll see that Blue Grotto offers brunch 3 ways.

We should all plan to order the "Full Brunch" for $18 per person. 

Remember that our group puts all food and non-alcoholic beverages on ONE BILL and divides that evenly by the number of attendees.  Each person is responsible to pay for their own Bloody Mary, Mimosa, Peach Bellini etc...

I  hope you can be there.  It should be a great meal.

And Blue Grotto does valet park for brunch !!!
item.name: September Brunch - Blue Grotto in Providence
